name: Deku x Bakugo
description: This is a game me and my team have been working on for about a year now. The ultimate Deku x Bakugo dating simulator. In this game you play as Deku, as Deku you have to traverse through school life at U.A. while trying to form strong bonds with your classmates, especially Bakugo. with over 10+ hours of gameplay and 20+ endings this game will keep you wanting more! Download Deku x Bakugo today!(for the low cost of free)
